New Records: Josh Inglis hit the fastest century recorded in men's T20Is for Australia, scoring 103 runs in 43 balls.
Key Match Events: Josh Inglis and Cam Green added 92 runs for the third wicket, turning the match in Australia's favor.
Scotland's batting effort was disappointing, with only Brandon McMullen reaching double figures.
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland won the toss and opted to bowl.
Post-Match Reflections: Josh Inglis expressed his delight at breaking the record and his desire to cement his spot in the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is a three-match series, with the sides meeting again on Saturday in the final match.
Others: Marcus Stoinis was the pick of the visiting attack, taking 4-23 and bowling 13 dot balls in his 3.4 overs.
